sentences.sContent: Her legs were partly paralyzed in the crash.
sentences.sCn: 在撞车事故中她的双腿部分瘫痪。

words.tran: 使麻痹；使无力；使失去勇气（paralyze的过去分词）

remMethod.val: para(在旁边) ＋ lyze(分开) → 身体的一边分开了 → 使瘫痪， 使麻痹

trans.tranOther: if something paralyzes you, it makes you lose the ability to move part or all of your body, or to feel it
